scripts.build: mkdir dist; npm run build-standard; npm run build-min
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.postversion: npm test && npm run build && npm run commit && git push -f origin release
scripts.commit: git checkout -b release && git add -f dist/ && git commit -am "Update dist for release"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
